Text.Page:
Greetings, !

No, we haven't met. But everyone's heard of you. Heck, word in the barracks is that Dirken will pay top coin for anything, um, disparaging about you.

Well, screw Dirken and his dirty money. But others lack both my rugged good looks and my unimpeachable virtue.

You ought to ingratiate yourself to your new comrades around here. One good way to do that is to hunt a bunch of {@LinkCreature:12#8#Red Lash killers} and bring back their weapons. That'll impress 'em.

I'll make sure everyone knows that these swords mean " is here and ready to kick ass."

And I might send a sword to Dirken with a note that says, "Dear Dirken: When I plucked this sword from a now-dead enemy, I thought of you..."

Look, if you just sit around, you'll get a reputation as a lollygagger. No one wants that.

I mean, just listen to the word. "Lollygagger." I can't say it with a straight face.

"Lollygagger." Hee hee!
